original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2376)@ 引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形雲氣盾，在接下來的$Status_duration(1506)@秒內減少30%物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2376)@ Yin Qi Condensation Shield, a spherical cloud gas shield is formed around the generals, which will reduce the physics by 30% in the next $Status_duration(1506)@ seconds hurt.
